titles.title: A bill for the relief of Clayton Timothy Boyle and Clayton Louis Boyle, son and father.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 9/24/1987--Introduced. Confers jurisdiction, notwithstanding time limitations, upon the U.S. District Court for the District of Hawaii to hear, determine, and render judgment upon the claims of two named individuals arising out of injuries allegedly suffered by one of them as the result of the failure of the Navy to provide proper medical diagnosis or treatment on or about November 1965.
